title: Cool place in a hot area
posting_body: Beautifully updated home available for lease in one the hottest up and coming areas in Houston..

Charming 3-bedroom, 1 bath featuring real hardwood floors, new central AC and heating, beautiful quartz bar that connects the kitchen and living room that allows you and your guests to enjoy wonderful meals together.
Fabulous touches throughout such as updated bathrooms with mosaic tiled shower, recessed cabinets, and matching shaker style cabinets.
Each of the three bedrooms has beautiful ceiling fans, closet space with modern LED lighting, while the master bedroom features a beautiful walk in closet.
This home also features a fully finished garage with washer and dryer.
This home has a fabulous backyard, great for cookouts.
Large beautiful oak trees in a very established neighborhood, just minutes away from the medical center, I-45 or the 610 loop.
The open floor plan makes the space feel much larger.
For more info see our website.
Rent is $1450 PM with security deposit, $35 application fee.
